sentences.en: Away from the eastern seaboard, the state sector still dominates.
sentences.cn: 但是除东部沿海地区外, 其余地区还是为国有经济主导.

sentences.en: But it's not alone . Here along the Atlantic seaboard, rising sea levels threaten entire communities.
sentences.cn: 在大西洋沿岸, 不断上升的海平面正在威胁着整个大陆.

sentences.en: Floodwaters are inundating states up and down the Eastern Seaboard.
sentences.cn: 洪水淹没了东部沿海各州.

sentences.en: In seaboard cities, the waterfront was the most important and colorful part of town.
sentences.cn: 在沿海城市, 码头区是城市中最重要、最有活力的地区.

sentences.en: New York City is on the Atlantic seaboard.
sentences.cn: 纽约市位于大西洋岸边.

sentences.en: That's thanks to a massive late - winter snow storm that hit the eastern seaboard.
sentences.cn: 这得益于袭击东部海岸地区巨大的晚冬暴风雪.

sentences.en: There may be only 300 North Atlantic right whales along the Seaboard, Perrin said.
sentences.cn: 佩兰说,沿东海岸可能只有300头北大西洋露脊鲸了.

sentences.en: We got a guy working the whole Eastern Seaboard murdering up and down the coast.
sentences.cn: 我们现在有人在查整个东部上下海岸的谋杀案件.

trans.tran_en: the part of a country that is near the sea
